title: Um, yeah, I'm new.
content:
I'm UltraByte. I'm new, hence the title of the thread.

I played CK4 when I was like 6, and just now rediscovered how awesome it is, and how much I suck at the game. So, now I'm in love. @_@

Um, yeah. Greet me.[Swim Swim Hungry]

title: Re: Um, yeah, I'm new.
content: Just sound. I wish the music worked...[Swim Swim Hungry]

title: Re: Um, yeah, I'm new.
content:
That's odd - the sound and music are both Adlib so unlike other games if one works both should. You might want to check the in-game options to make sure the music is actually switched on [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img]

I think a lack of memory can also stop the game from loading music, but that shouldn't be a problem under XP or newer.

title: Re: Um, yeah, I'm new.
content: Yeah, the music's supposedly turned on. However, I do have the sound running under speakers, and not the Adlib, and the sound's coming from the computer like it's supposed to.[Swim Swim Hungry]

title: Re: Um, yeah, I'm new.
content:
Nah, that's just PC speaker sound. If your sound card supports it (like mine), you can install Adlib drivers for Windows and have all the GOOD sound/music. If not, you can use something like VDMSound to emulate the Adlib sound for the game. Or as a last, processing-heavy measure, you could use DOSbox. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: Um, yeah, I'm new.
content:
hi nice to see a new member [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

if you have windows xp or vista dosbox is a must version 0.70 is fast[ter than v0.65]
i can even run build games [blood , duke nukem 3d , shadow warrior] without lag
[url=http://dosbox.sourceforge.net/download.php?main=1&begaming_website_session=50bcc9f9ce120e284ffc4976587a5719]the dosbox site [download section][/url]

if you have duke nukem 3d or shadow warrior check jonof's site for ports for sw and dn3d
[url=http://jonof.edgenetwork.org/]click here to go to jonof's site[/url][url=http://profile.xfire.com/memsys][img]http://miniprofile.xfire.com/bg/bg/type/2/memsys.png[/img][/url]

title: Re: Um, yeah, I'm new.
content:
Nah, that's just PC speaker sound.
Oh, well, I could just get CK songs and put them on my iPod... Then I could listen to them at school. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img]

Your avatar looks good.
Tanks. I'm trying to do an animation of my sprited CK character (hey, I get bored easily. <_<), and it's kinda hard to do with GIMP.

You WANT to hear Adlib/Sblaster music and sounds from CK in your PC. Believe me, CK music rocks. You can't play without it. You can't, you CAN'T.
I think my sister's computer has the sound. Then again, she's on it every waking moment of her life.[Swim Swim Hungry]
